resources.string: Shrek is a big ogre who lives alone in the woods, feared by all the people in the land of Duloc. When Lord Farquaad, the ruler of Duloc, exiles all the fairy-tale beings to the woods, Shrek loses his peaceful life and his home becomes a refugee camp.

Shrek is a big ogre who lives alone in the woods, feared by all the people in the land of Duloc. When Lord Farquaad, the ruler of Duloc, exiles all the fairy-tale beings to the woods, Shrek loses his peaceful life and his home becomes a refugee camp.

Érase una vez un ogro verde llamado Shrek que vivía en un pantano muy lejano, feliz con sus baños de barro y su particular concepto de la higiene. Pero un buen día, su preciada soledad se ve interrumpida por la invasión de un grupo de molestos personajes salidos de cuentos clásicos.
